text: <@U02F8TTPU> <@U0260V1BX> Microphone news! We're going to implement the microphone UI controls on the native side, with a generic UI.
At this point, we'll approach it with just the generic UI -- no requirements for customization from the JS side.
<@U02F8TTPU> I'll come by and chat with you a little more about this to make sure I understand the implementation right.
<@U0260V1BX> We'll need some design help from you. We're going to design this UI (D5 studio is slammed), based on reference that D5 will provide.
I have a feeling there might be some more design tasks coming down the line, based on his eagerness for us to help.
